summary: Completed comprehensive testing of garment manufacturing ERP system. Backend APIs 96.9% functional, frontend UI fully operational with minor modal interaction issues. All core business flows from user registration to MRP creation working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Delete operation returns 404 for existing material
minor_bugs.impact: Cannot delete raw materials through API
minor_bugs.details: Likely due to foreign key constraints or material being referenced elsewhere

working_endpoints: /api/mrps - Create, Read, Delete operations with auto-generated serial numbers

ui_bugs.issue: Overlay blocking form interactions in master data creation dialogs
ui_bugs.details: Modal overlay prevents clicking on form elements, requires force clicks or better z-index management

working_features: Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Masters, BOM, MRP)

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (register, login, verify user)
All master data CRUD operations (buyers, suppliers, materials, colors, sizes, articles)
BOM creation with material consumption and wastage calculation
MRP creation with auto-generated serial numbers (MRP-00001 format)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay z-index issue in master data creation dialogs to improve form usability. The delete raw material API endpoint should be investigated for proper foreign key constraint handling.
